text: Kabita ( – 8 June 2012) was a Bangladeshi film actress who starred in films like Dhanyee Meye, Molua, Kanchanmala and Coolie. ==Career== Kabita was born in Karachi, Dominion of Pakistan in 1952. Her family moved to Bangladesh after 1971. She made her film debut in 1967 as a child artist in Kanchanmala. Later, she got her breakthrough in 1969 with Nil Akasher Niche where she played a supporting role alongside Kabori Sarwar. Dhanyee Meye is considered her most applauded film. She left Dhallywood after marriage in 1975. She divorced her husband in 1982 and made a comeback. She died on 8 June 2012 in Dhaka. ==Filmography== == References == Category:1952 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Actresses in Bengali cinema Category:Bangladeshi film actresses
title: Kabita (actress)
